author: cbs8
title: Catch Catfish More Conveniently With the JIFFY HOOK - Designed by InventHelp Clients (KSC-1031)
text:
Pittsburgh-based InventHelp is working to submit the JIFFY HOOK to appropriate companies for their review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
Two inventors from Liberty, Mo., want to streamline the process of fishing for catfish. "We designed this after realizing how difficult it is to bait a hook for catching catfish," he said.
The ergonomic and easy-to-use JIFFY HOOK enables a user to bait a hook for catfish more easily, which saves time and effort. The hook also prevents loss of bait, as well as allows for more convenient and enjoyable fishing.
The original design was submitted to the Kansas City office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-KSC-1031, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
